Shivah:

"You're looking me as if I were your enemy and by now I don't" said 
Shivah while he trasnformed to his robot mode. "I'm Shivah... I'm a 
predacon and I owe my loyalty to BlackFortress's Master: Darkfate"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., ragnus_@h... wrote:
>  Ragnus paused in his 'feeding' as the blue trasmetal three headed 
> dragon spoke. Looking up from his energon source, he turned to face 
> the other dragon.  Not knowing weather or not this bot was a 
threat, 
> he rose to his full height and spread his wings to thier full 
length, 
> preparing for an attack.
> 
>   "Before I tell you anything...to whom do you owe allegiance young
